title: Stacy Hilt from The Casket Lottery/Coalesce
itunes:title: Stacy Hilt from The Casket Lottery/Coalesce
description:
Stacy Hilt from The Casket Lottery/Coalesce is on the show this week and it’s a real fun discussion. We talk about being dependable, the creative balance you have to strike in your life and his early life playing in Coalesce. I’d consider myself pretty knowledgable about the bands he’s played in, but there are details that blew my mind during this chat. Want a better night sleep? Try a Casper for 100 days and your life will change. DO IT UP Get 15% off by using the code PC100WORDSORLESS. Visit Rockabillia.com and find it ALL! Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show! Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
